snippet: How four of the most powerful players in the New York region shape policy, and lives.
abstract: New York Times reporters describe political accomplishments of New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, New Jersey Governor Chris Christie, New York Governor Andrew M Cuomo and New York City Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly and speculate about their futures. Photo (M)/

byline.original: By DAVID W. CHEN, KATE ZERNIKE, DANNY HAKIM and AL BAKER

lead_paragraph: As part of a special issue of Metropolitan on the powers of New York, here is how four of the most influential players in the region shape policy, and lives. Michael R. Bloomberg | Mayor of New York City
